content:
MethodDispatcherBase MethodDispatcherBase Class

In this Article

Edit

The base class used by remoting code generator to generate the type that dispatches requests from the client to the right interface and method of the remoted object.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class MethodDispatcherBase : IMethodDispatcherPublic MustInherit Class MethodDispatcherBase
    Implements IMethodDispatcher

Inheritance Hierarchy

    Object

    MethodDispatcherBase
